0x64C3F1C0.name: SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_WIDTH

params.name: vehicle
params.description: The vehicle to set data for.

params.name: width
params.description: Width of the wheels (usually between 0.1 and 1.5 is reasonable).

0x64C3F1C0.description:
Sets vehicle's wheels' width (width is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels.
Returns whether change was successful (can be false if trying to set width for non-default wheels).
0x64C3F1C0.resultsDescription: Bool - whether change was successful or not
